name: Re Angel
description: Re Angel is a 2nd visual novel created by Studio GU, an indy game developer from Thailand.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
